column2:
"
#LAD index is 14
#PRIOR
PRIORLAD <- melt(PRIOR$HR_h[,14]); 
PRIORLAD$TEAM = rep("LAD_HR_PRIOR", nrow(PRIORLAD)); 
#POST
POSTLAD <- melt(POST$HR_h[,14]); 
POSTLAD$TEAM = rep("LAD_HR_POST", nrow(POSTLAD))
#
TEMP <- as.data.frame(rbind(PRIORLAD, POSTLAD))
#
ggplot(TEMP) + 
  geom_density(aes(x = value, group=TEAM, col=TEAM), kernel="gaussian") +
  xlim(-2, 2) +
  ylim(0, 4) +
  theme_minimal() +
    theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  ggtitle("Prior and Posterior For Sigma")
"
sigma <- PRIOR$sigma; sigma <- as.data.frame(sigma); sigma$class <- rep("prior", nrow(sigma))
sigma.po <- POST$sigma; sigma.po <- as.data.frame(sigma.po); sigma.po$class <- rep("post", nrow(sigma.po))
